abouts.name: meeLib
abouts.author: Yann Meessen
abouts.description:
meeLib is my first ever published coding project.
'mee' comes from the first 3 letters of my last name : Meessen
This is pronounced 'mɛ' like the first syllable of 'Metal'.
Also, pardon my english, it's not my native language.
Icons are provided by flaticon.com and converted with svgtrace.com
Icons artistic direction, named 'Pipou', is a colaboration with Aude Portal√®s.
If you spot any bug, have any criticism about this lib
or just want to chat, please contact me through my e-mail above :D
